page.title: 11BROADWAY CENTRE (2)
page.content:
On the ground floor there are shops along the Broadway frontage and down the central shopping mall. In total, there are 51 shops, some large stores like Marks and Spencers and Woolworths, while others are smaller units.
Lifts take shoppers to the second and third floor car parks. People using the Centre were asked what they liked or dis-liked about it. The dis-likes were few, the main being the lack od adequate parking space on Saturdays. The good points were many covering; the range of good shops, covered shopping making life easier, freedom from traffic, bus services to the door and the Centre being well run and regularly cleaned.
